channel.title: Novagen on Ziggurat
channel.description: Recent content in Novagen on Ziggurat

item.title: Paul Woakes interviewed?!
item.description: Yesterday the people behind the “From Bedrooms To Billions” doco tweeted something very intriguing indeed: Latest interview just shot! With the sword of Damocles over our heads we needed a Mercenary to bail us out! What an Encounter that was! — FrmBedrooms2Billions (@FromBedrooms) May 17, 2013 This is obviously a reference to Novagen, but could this actually mean they interviewed Paul Woakes? As far as I’m aware, this would be a first if true.
